t: Ezekiel 23
Two Harlot Sisters
The*p word of the Lord*s came again to me, saying:
“Son*pn of man, there were two women, The*ld daughters of one mother.
They*ld committed harlotry in Egypt, They*ld committed harlotry in their youth; Their*ld breasts were there embraced, Their*ld virgin bosom was there pressed.
Their*ld names: Oholah the elder and Oholibah her sister; They*ld were Mine, And*ld they bore sons and daughters. As*ild for*i their names, Samaria*ld is*i Oholah, and Jerusalem is*i Oholibah.
The Older Sister, Samaria
“Oholah*pn played the harlot even though she was Mine; And*ld she lusted for her lovers, the neighboring Assyrians,
Who*ild were*i clothed in purple, Captains*ld and rulers, All*ld of them desirable young men, Horsemen*ld riding on horses.
Thus*ld she committed her harlotry with them, All*ld of them choice men of Assyria; And*ld with all for whom she lusted, With*ld all their idols, she defiled herself.
She*ld has never given up her harlotry brought*i from Egypt, For*ld in her youth they had lain with her, Pressed*ld her virgin bosom, And*ld poured out their immorality upon her.
“Therefore*ln I have delivered her Into*ld the hand of her lovers, Into*ld the hand of the Assyrians, For*ld whom she lusted.
They*ld uncovered her nakedness, Took*ld away her sons and daughters, And*ld slew her with the sword; She*ld became a byword among women, For*ld they had executed judgment on her.
The Younger Sister, Jerusalem
“Now*p although her sister Oholibah saw this,*i she became more corrupt in her lust than she, and in her harlotry more corrupt than her sister’s harlotry.
“She*pn lusted for the neighboring Assyrians, Captains*ld and rulers, Clothed*ld most gorgeously, Horsemen*ld riding on horses, All*ld of them desirable young men.
Then*ld I saw that she was defiled; Both*ld took*i the same way.
But*ld she increased her harlotry; She*ld looked at men portrayed on the wall, Images*ld of Chaldeans portrayed in vermilion,
Girded*ld with belts around their waists, Flowing*ld turbans on their heads, All*ld of them looking like captains, In*ld the manner of the Babylonians of Chaldea, The*ld land of their nativity.
As*ld soon as her eyes saw them, She*ld lusted for them And*ld sent messengers to them in Chaldea.
“Then*ln the Babylonians came to her, into the bed of love, And*ld they defiled her with their immorality; So*ld she was defiled by them, and alienated herself from them.
She*ld revealed her harlotry and uncovered her nakedness. Then*ld I alienated Myself from her, As*ld I had alienated Myself from her sister.
“Yet*ln she multiplied her harlotry In*ld calling to remembrance the days of her youth, When*ld she had played the harlot in the land of Egypt.
For*ld she lusted for her paramours, Whose*ld flesh is*i like*i the flesh of donkeys, And*ld whose issue is*i like*i the issue of horses.
Thus*ld you called to remembrance the lewdness of your youth, When*ld the Egyptians pressed your bosom Because*ld of your youthful breasts.
Judgment on Jerusalem
“Therefore,*p Oholibah, thus says the Lord God:*s ‘Behold,*pn I will stir up your lovers against you, From*ld whom you have alienated yourself, And*ld I will bring them against you from every side:

The*ld Babylonians, All*ld the Chaldeans, Pekod,*ld Shoa, Koa, All*ld the Assyrians with them, All*ld of them desirable young men, Governors*ld and rulers, Captains*ld and men of renown, All*ld of them riding on horses.

And*ld they shall come against you With*ld chariots, wagons, and war-horses, With*ld a horde of people. They*ld shall array against you Buckler,*ld shield, and helmet all around. ‘I*ld will delegate judgment to them, And*ld they shall judge you according to their judgments.

I*ld will set My jealousy against you, And*ld they shall deal furiously with you; They*ld shall remove your nose and your ears, And*ld your remnant shall fall by the sword; They*ld shall take your sons and your daughters, And*ld your remnant shall be devoured by fire.
They*ld shall also strip you of your clothes And*ld take away your beautiful jewelry.
‘Thus*ln I will make you cease your lewdness and your harlotry Brought*ild from the land of Egypt, So*ld that you will not lift your eyes to them, Nor*ld remember Egypt anymore.’
“For*p thus says the Lord God:*s ‘Surely I will deliver you into the hand of those you hate, into the hand of*i those*i from whom you alienated yourself.
They will deal hatefully with you, take away all you have worked for, and leave you naked and bare. The nakedness of your harlotry shall be uncovered, both your lewdness and your harlotry.
I will do these things*i to you because you have gone as a harlot after the Gentiles, because you have become defiled by their idols.
You have walked in the way of your sister; therefore I will put her cup in your hand.’
“Thus*p says the Lord God:*s ‘You*pn shall drink of your sister’s cup, The*ld deep and wide one; You*ld shall be laughed to scorn And*ld held in derision; It*ld contains much.
You*ld will be filled with drunkenness and sorrow, The*ld cup of horror and desolation, The*ld cup of your sister Samaria.
You*ld shall drink and drain it, You*ld shall break its shards, And*ld tear at your own breasts; For*ld I have spoken,’ Says*ld the Lord God.*s
“Therefore*p thus says the Lord God:*s ‘Because*pn you have forgotten Me and cast Me behind your back, Therefore*ld you shall bear the penalty*i Of*ild your lewdness and your harlotry.’”
Both Sisters Judged
The*p Lord*s also said to me: “Son of man, will you judge Oholah and Oholibah? Then declare to them their abominations.

For they have committed adultery, and blood is*i on their hands. They have committed adultery with their idols, and even sacrificed*i their sons whom they bore to Me, passing them through the*i fire,*i to devour them.*i
Moreover they have done this to Me: They have defiled My sanctuary on the same day and profaned My Sabbaths.
For after they had slain their children for their idols, on the same day they came into My sanctuary to profane it; and indeed thus they have done in the midst of My house.
“Furthermore*p you sent for men to come from afar, to whom a messenger was*i sent; and there they came. And you washed yourself for them, painted your eyes, and adorned yourself with ornaments.
You sat on a stately couch, with a table prepared before it, on which you had set My incense and My oil.
The sound of a carefree multitude was*i with her, and Sabeans were*i brought from the wilderness with men of the common sort, who put bracelets on their wrists and beautiful crowns on their heads.
Then I said concerning her*i who*i had*i grown*i old in adulteries, ‘Will they commit harlotry with her now, and she with*i them?’*i
Yet they went in to her, as men go in to a woman who plays the harlot; thus they went in to Oholah and Oholibah, the lewd women.
But righteous men will judge them after the manner of adulteresses, and after the manner of women who shed blood, because they are*i adulteresses, and blood is*i on their hands.
“For*p thus says the Lord God:*s ‘Bring up an assembly against them, give them up to trouble and plunder.
The assembly shall stone them with stones and execute them with their swords; they shall slay their sons and their daughters, and burn their houses with fire.
Thus I will cause lewdness to cease from the land, that all women may be taught not to practice your lewdness.
They shall repay you for your lewdness, and you shall pay for your idolatrous sins. Then you shall know that I am*i the Lord God.’”*s
